name: Yanqing
story: General Jing Yuan's retainer. A gifted swordsman who hasn't even come of age.No one can best Yanqing when he holds a sword in hand.

skills.name: Frost Thorn
skills.description: Deals minor Ice DMG to a single enemy.

skills.name: Darting Ironthorn
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to a single enemy and activates the Soulsteel Sync.

skills.name: Amidst the Raining Bliss
skills.description: Increases Yanqing's CRIT Rate. Enhances "Soulsteel Sync" and deals massive Ice DMG to a single enemy.

skills.name: One With the Sword
skills.description: During Soulsteel Sync, reduces the chance of this character being attacked and increases their CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG. After attacking an enemy, there is a chance of launching a follow-up attack, dealing Ice DMG with a chance to Freeze the target.Soulsteel Sync will be removed after this character receives damage.

skills.name: The One True Sword
skills.description: After this character uses Technique, at the start of the next battle, increases the DMG dealt by this character to enemy targets whose HP is 50% or higher.

eidolons.name: Svelte Saber
eidolons.description: When Yanqing attacks a Frozen enemy, he deals Additional Ice DMG equal to 60% of his ATK.

eidolons.name: Supine Serenade
eidolons.description: When Soulsteel Sync is active, Energy Regeneration Rate increases by an extra 10%.

eidolons.name: Sword Savant
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Searing Sting
eidolons.description: When the current HP percentage is 80% or higher, Ice RES PEN increases by 12%.

eidolons.name: Surging Strife
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Swift Swoop
eidolons.description: If the buffs from Soulsteel Sync or the Ultimate are in effect when an enemy is defeated, the duration of these buffs is extended by 1 turn.
